sentences.en: 'Thank you, sir,'returned Joyce, with the same quiet civility.
sentences.cn: “ 谢谢, 先生, ” 乔伊斯仍然像刚才那样细声细气、礼貌周到地说.

sentences.en: Darcy : Might I ask why with so little civility lam thus repulsed?
sentences.cn: 我能不能问一下,为什么我会就这样被毫不客气地拒绝?

sentences.en: He addressed her with easy civility and twisted his head into a bow.
sentences.cn: 他以很轻松的礼节向埃莉诺致意,并垂首一鞠躬.

sentences.en: He asked nothing more than civility from the rest of the world.
He came in with a great show of civility like a man among inferiors.
sentences.cn: 他进来时就表现得气派十足,仿佛是处在一群下等人中间.

sentences.en: He fairly outstripped himself in willingness and civility; he was all smiles at everyone.
sentences.cn: 他刻意显得惟命是听、彬彬有礼, 对每个人都满脸堆笑.
他谦恭地同我们打了招呼.

sentences.en: He threw out the bridge of a charming hollow civility.
sentences.cn: 他架起了一座虚情假意的迷人的桥梁.

sentences.en: Hurgo withdrew , with much civility and cheerful countenance.
sentences.cn: 赫够恭敬地、和颜悦色地退了下去.

sentences.en: I am worn out with civility.
sentences.cn: 我已经应酬得疲惫不堪.

sentences.en: Mr. Slope's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy.
sentences.cn: 斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚.

sentences.en: Please have the civility to knock before you enter next time.
sentences.cn: 下次你进来之前要有点礼貌——先敲门。

sentences.en: She turned up her nose at my civility.
sentences.cn: 我献殷勤时,他翘起了鼻子.

sentences.en: Staff members are trained to treat customers with civility at all times.
sentences.cn: 全体职员接受训练，以便在任何时候对顾客都以礼相待。

sentences.en: The young men treated him with great civility, and gradually engaged him in a conversation.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻人对他非常客气, 渐渐与他交谈起来.

sentences.en: Tom shows his civility before his parents' friends.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在他父母的朋友面前表现得彬彬有礼。

words.tran_cn: 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的
教化；使…文明；启发（civilize的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: polite behaviour which most people consider normal
